g.text: Most people start in a loop —
box a to b, then c to d — where
You swipe, you like, maybe chat, maybe not.
This is the landscape of typical social networks:
Instead of a → b → c → d cycles, you move forward.
You start alone, but at checkpoints, you're paired through
inference, not preference. The result isn’t just connection,
It’s the difference between going in circles and growing forward.
Buddy.me breaks this loop by introducing a direction — a roadmap.
